package.name: dynamic_map_server
package.description: dynamic_map_server provides a modified version of the map_server ROS Node, which offers map data as a ROS Service. This version provides a /set_map ros service which allows updating the map and /save_map ros service which saves the current map to disk in the .ros directory.
